|cpu1_cores = 1 |cpu1_type = MIPS 74Kc |cpu1_type_rev = |cpu1spd = 500 |is_doc = |bus = |flash1type = |fla1_num = |fla1chip = Macronix;MX29GL640ELT2I-70G; |flash1size = 8 |flash1maxsize = |ram1type = |ram1type1 = |ram1spd = |ram1size = 64 |ram1chip = ESMT;M14D5121632A-2.5B; |ram1_num = |nvramsize = |eth_cpu = true |sw1chip = Realtek;RTL8367R; |wan_ports = 1 |wan_speed = 1GbE |lan_ports = 4 |lan_speed = 1GbE |ethstandard = |portbasedvlan = |802.1qvlan = |auto_mdix = |sup_jumbo = |ethoui = 34:08:04 |oui = 34:08:04 |bootwait = |stockbootloader = U-Boot;3.3;Ralink; |stockos = Linux;2.6.33.2; |exp_if_types = USB 2.0 |exp_usb_num = 1 |usb_hub = |pwr_volt_type = VDC |pwr_vdc = 12 |pwr_amp_dc = 2 |pwr_conn = barrel |pwr_barrel_outer = |pwr_barrel_inner = |pwr_barrel_len = |pwr_pol = |serial = yes,, internal,, 4-pin header,, 3.3V TTL,, unpopulated,, (57600 8N1) |jtag = |specialfeat = |flags = |addchip = 5GHz Power Amplifier IC;SiGe;SE2537L;SiGe, 2537L, 045KW;2;,,, 2.4GHz Power Amplifier IC;Microchip;SST12LP15A;SST, 12LP15A, A;2;,,, 3A, 18V, 340KHz Synchronous Rectified Step-Down Converter;MPS;MP1484EN;;1;,,, 2A, 23V, 340kHz Synchronous Step-Down Converter;Richtek;RT8282AH;;1;,,, Simple Buck Converter;uPI;uP6306;;2;,,, |802dot11_protocols = abgn |defaulip = 192.168.0.1 |defaultlogin = admin |defaultpass = |defaultssid = SWR1100, SWR1100_media |defaultssid_regex = ^SWR1100$,,,^SWR1100_media$ |default_ch = |manuf = Alpha Networks |manuf_model = WRG-ND10 |manuf_rev = |is_manuf = No |tpfirmware = Padavan, OpenWrt |availability = |eoldate = |fccapprovdate = 02/08/2011 |estreldate = 04/08/2011 |estprice = |upc = 036725234666 |ean = |dx_sku = |newegg = |asin = B004S12IKW |asin_country = |asin2 = |asin_country2 = |countrymanuf = China |buttons = |led = |dimensions = |weight = |wi1_if_name = |rad1chip1cpu = true |rad1oui = |rad1_ant_conn = U.FL |rad1txchains = 2 |rad1rxchains = 2 |rad1sstreams = 2 |rad1stand = IEEE 802.11a/n |rad1n = 300 |rad1a = 54 |rad1freq = 5 |wi2_if_name = |rad2chip1 = Ralink;RT3092; |rad2oui = |rad2_ant_conn = U.FL |rad2txchains = 2 |rad2rxchains = 2 |rad2sstreams = 2 |rad2stand = IEEE 802.11b/g/n |rad2n = 300 |rad2g = 54 |rad2b = 11 |rad2freq = 2.4 }}{{TIDTOC|embedded}} ==Overview== "8WRGND10.2A1G" is silkscreened on the board. :The device is assumed to use RT3092 for the 2.4GHz wireless interface. :The default SSIDs for this device are '''SWR1100''' and '''SWR1100_media'''. :The default telnet credentials are ''Alphanetworks'' (user) and ''wrgnd10_samsung_ss815'' (password). ===Included PSU(s)=== The power supply included with the unit is a (''Samsung'' branded) ''Yang Ming Industrial'' DA-24B12-FAC. {{hasPowerSupply |brand = Yang Ming Industrial |model = DA-24B12-FAC |input_v=100-240 |input_a=0.65 |input_c=AC |input_hz=47-63 |input_conn=C7 |output_v=12 |output_a=2 |output_c=DC |output_conn=barrel |style=modular, brick |countrymanuf = China |e_level=5 }} ==Links of Interest== [http://www.flickr.com/photos/samsungusa/5327632019/in/photostream/ Pictures] ==Flashing== {{Flashnotice}} ===Manufacturer firmware=== It has long been thought that no manufacturer firmware, other than that installed, was available. But at [http://www.d-link.co.kr/samsung/dn_center.php?code=d D-Link Korea] we find (2015-08-19) *[http://www.d-link.co.kr/samsung/data/CYSWR1100A1_FW100b29.bin CYSWR1100A1_FW100b29.bin] *[http://www.d-link.co.kr/samsung/data/CYSWR1100A1_FW100b31.bin CYSWR1100A1_FW100b31.bin] and better still, by interpolation: *[http://www.d-link.co.kr/samsung/data/CYSWR1100A1_FW100b30.bin CYSWR1100A1_FW100b30.bin] Each of these firmwares can be uploaded from the others. Also importantly, each can be used to restore the firmware to stock after trying Padavan, OpenWrt etc., by flashing from uBoot using a serial console and tftp. (It is also possible to save stock before the first flash, from mtd2) The three firmwares: ====100b29==== Significantly smaller, so presumably lacks something. Log as built: Linux version 2.6.33.2 (joely@enzo) (gcc version 4.3.3 (GCC) ) #1 Tue Feb 15 10:23:37 CST 2011 Version in web interface is: 1.00 Tue 15 Feb 2011 ====100b30==== Log as built: Linux version 2.6.33.2 (joely@enzo) (gcc version 4.3.3 (GCC) ) #1 Fri Mar 25 11:42:20 CST 2011 Version in web interface is: 1.00 Fri 25 Mar 2011 ====100b31==== Perhaps defaults to a 192.168.1.1 gateway, at least that address is mentioned in its description. It is not immediately obvious whether there are any other improvements over 100b30. Linux version 2.6.33.2 (joely@Apollo) (gcc version 4.3.3 (GCC) ) #1 Tue Feb 21 17:06:02 CST 2012 Version in web interface is: 1.00 Tue 21 Feb 2012 ===Flashing OpenWrt=== {{OpenWrt |techdata = https://openwrt.org/toh/hwdata/samsung/samsung_cy-swr1100 |wikipage = |forumpage = |forumpage2 = |forumpage3 = |github = |target = ramips |subtarget = rt3883 |arch = mipsel_74kc |support_started_version = 17.01.0 |current_supported_version = |unsupportedfuncntions = |comment = }} Please insert instructions here ==JTAG-Serial Info== ===Serial=== *[http://www.dd-wrt.com/phpBB2/viewtopic.php?t=268169 Samsung CY-SWR1100 - How to flash firmware via serial USB] 
Linux version 3.0.102 (padavan@hms) (gcc version 4.4.7 (GCC) ) #1 Thu Aug 21 22:23:58 MSK 2014
 ====Serial Pinouts==== The header is '''JP1'''. The pinout seems to be the following.. 
(RxD) (+3.3v) (GND) (TxD)
{{/Serial info}} [[Category:English Documentation]]
